TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SizeChangedEventHandler(object sender, SizeChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SizeChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object where the event handler is attached.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the routed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This delegate must be used by handlers of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.SizeChanged> event.
